content: The Bucks County Civil War Museum will be hosting a Haunted History walking tour through Doylestown on Saturday, October 30th at 7:00pm. They will be meeting in the court yard of the Museum, located at 32 North Broad Street and Garden Alley. The tour will then take a stroll through the heart of town. It will conclude in the Doylestown Cemetery. Tickets are limited and are $10 a person or $30 per family, which includes a membership to the Bucks County Civil War RoundTable Museum and Library. To reserve tickets please contact them at allie.ann.smith@gmail.comÂ  or call (215) 822-1562
